mapper.select: SELECT R.RPLY_ID , R.AR_ID R_AR_ID , R.CONT R_CONT , R.CRT_DT R_CRT_DT , R.MBR_ID R_MBR_ID , R.RCMND_CNT , R.PRNT_RPLY_ID , C.AR_ID , C.SBJ , C.CONT , C.MBR_ID C_MBR_ID , C.CRT_DT C_CRT_DT , C.MDFY_DT C_MDFY_DT , C.RD_CNT C_RD_CNT , C.MN_ID C_MN_ID , M.MBR_ID , M.NCK_NM , M.AUTH FROM CLB C , MBR M , RPLY R WHERE C.MBR_ID = M.MBR_ID AND C.MBR_ID = R.MBR_ID AND R.AR_ID = C.AR_ID AND C.AR_ID = #{articleId}

SELECT R.RPLY_ID , R.AR_ID R_AR_ID , R.CONT R_CONT , R.CRT_DT R_CRT_DT , R.MBR_ID R_MBR_ID , R.RCMND_CNT , R.PRNT_RPLY_ID , M.MBR_ID , M.NCK_NM , M.AUTH FROM MBR M , RPLY R WHERE M.MBR_ID = R.MBR_ID AND R.RPLY_ID = #{replyId}
